item.title: How to create a successful email campaign
item.description:
To ensure your marketing emails are read, prioritize the customer’s experience, advises GetResponse, a company specializing in online marketing tools. GetResponse CEO Simon Grabowski highlights three key elements for a successful email marketing strategy: Understanding Subscriber Behavior Analyze past email opens and clicks to gain insights into your subscribers’ interests, email habits, and peak engagement times. Optimizing for Device Preferences With over 40% of emails being deleted due to poor mobile optimization, it’s crucial to tailor content for different devices...

item.title: GetResponse introduces its email marketing platform in the ASEAN region
item.description:
GetResponse, an email marketing platform, has officially launched in the ASEAN region. The company enhanced its cloud-based platform earlier this year to include support for Chinese, Malay, and Thai languages. This move has contributed to a significant 41.6% surge in new account registrations. GetResponse has observed a 35.8% year-over-year growth in email marketing activities within ASEAN. Source: GetResponse website. Simon Grabowski, CEO of GetResponse, emphasized the significance of email marketing, especially for small and medium-sized businesses working with limited budgets...
